description:
Codes for cloud segmentation in ground-based infrared sky images adquiared using an sky imager mounted on a solar tracker. The codes run in a High Performances Computer. The library for the paralellization is MPI.

See journal article: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0960148121006674

See CEEGE conference article: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2352484721006235

See IEEE PES ISGT conference article: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9639922

See realated data: https://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.zcrjdfn9m

Additional funding was provided by the King Felipe VI Endowed Chair of the University of New Mexico.
title: Cloud Segmentation in Infrared Sky Images
